captions.text: This an emotion between a man and a woman

Don’t wanna calculate it, 
Don’t wanna regulate it

If I knew the true love was like this,
I can’t be sure if I’d have tried it
All I feel is anger and the danger
It’s always like this
You=you, me=me
Your formula
Cellphone is just accessory
Am I really your boyfriend? I’m sick
Why do you put off your feelings like homework?

Are we doing business?
Or do you hate me?
Be more affectionate
Today I put a spell on you again
We’re like parallel lines
Looking at the same spot but so different
You’re the only one I have
But why do I feel like you’re not there

You ask me “Are you sulky?”
When I’m down
Have you ever done anything to make me down?
You’re cute and I’m just pathetic

Hope a miracle happens 
so that you love me more than I love you
You don’t have me
But I’m so full of you
I'm going crazy
So why do I keep doing this?
Why do you make me a fool?
I’m warning you now
Don’t make me confused
You kidding?
Who do you think I am?
Am I easy? Uh
Are you playing with me?
You’re in danger
Why do you test me?
Don’t make me confused
You kidding?
Who do you think I am?
Am I easy? Uh
Are you playing with me?
You’re in danger
Why do you test me?
Why do you test me?
Don’t make me confused
I’m so sick because of you
Don’t make me confused
You’re so bad to me
Don’t make me confused
Missed calls, unlock you’re wanted
I’m trying to find out your real mind
All you did was sending me 2lines of text message
Is this the relationship I wanted? Dream?
Where did all the love stories go?
TV dramas don’t make any sense
I grab my hairs hundreds of times
You look calm
You dump me
What am I to you?
I hear your news from your friend
I want you uh want you
You’re a swindler
You’re the criminal who shook my heart
You used me up before you got caught on fire
My efforts to win your heart do not work
I’m just a friend to you
You seem to like that more
I’m a love loser

You hesitate
All your mistakes

Stop wasting my time
So you like playing games

Roll the dice again
But beware, you take care
You’re in danger tonight

My heart is burning can you feel it tonight?
Like an open fire lighting up the sky

There will be no escape
U and me face-to-face

We take it all the way
We’re in danger tonight

My heart is burning can you feel it tonight?
Like an open fire lighting up the sky

There will be no escape
U and me face-to-face

We take it all the way
We’re in danger tonight
I’m so sick because of you
We’re in danger tonight
You’re so bad to me
We’re in danger tonight

comments.author: Christina Ho

comments.text:
Có nhiều đứa comment ngu. Kiêu ngạo thì vô đối mà ko có tự trọng, ko bít 
cách giữ sỉ diện. Nếu Thanh Bùi viết được bài hay như vậy thì viết thêm 10 
bài hay nữa ko được hả. Tại sao phải ích kỉ giữ riêng cho mình. Những người 
này mời làm chung với BTS tại người ta thấy Bùi có tài. Bộ BTS ko đủ đô hả. 
Ai mới đc? Mấy you có làm đc vậy ko. Cái này gọi là hợp tác đó. Nói túm lại 
bỏ cái tính kiêu ngạo với tham lam đi để đất nước còn nhanh phát triển.﻿

comments.text:
By the way the stage name of Thanh Bùi is 청배 (Cheong Bae) and 清裴 (Qing 
Pei/Ching Pui) in Korean and Chinese respectively. His full actual name: 
Bùi Vũ Thanh which is 배무청 (Bae Mu Cheong) or 裴武清 (Pei Wu Qing/Pui Mou 
Ching).﻿

comments.author: Safa Kpop

comments.text:
I love BTS so much but oh my god, this might be my favourite song by them 
ever. I love the original of Danger too, but this just blew me away it's 
amazing and it really makes you feel something. It also shows how diverse 
their music can be and that's pretty fucking awesome too. The way this was 
made was just so genius, it gives each persons vocals more impact, 
especially the rapping like when J-Hope started rapping I got goosebumps 
and they didn't go away until Suga had finished. This entire remix is an 
actual work of art and I'm so glad they made this, not many groups (not 
just in South Korea, but worldwide) can turn such an aggressive original 
track into something like this, it flows beautifully. It also made me 
question my loyalty to my bias Taehyung because good lord Jimin looks so 
good in this. I cannot point out a single flaw for this video other than it 
doesn't last long enough. ﻿
